## Slide with Plot

```{r,echo=FALSE}

library(plotly)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

data("EuStockMarkets")
 stocks <- as.data.frame(EuStockMarkets) %>%
  gather(index, price) %>%
  mutate(time = rep(time(EuStockMarkets), 4))

 plot_ly(stocks, x = ~time, y = ~price, color = ~index )

```
